alert.note: Alert for Logan (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 3:24PM MDT until August 02 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Logan County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 415 PM MDT. * At 324 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles west of St Petersburg, or 13 miles east of Sterling, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... St Petersburg around 340 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
